headline: Ralph Lauren and GIII Apparel have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: Ralph Lauren shines with record growth and digital expansion while GIII Apparel struggles with weak demand and costly transitions.

raw.headline: Ralph Lauren and GIII Apparel have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
raw.summary: Ralph Lauren shines with record growth and digital expansion while GIII Apparel struggles with weak demand and costly transitions.

headline: Bull of the Day: Ralph Lauren (RL)
summary: Attributed to its global expansion and digital transformation, Ralph Lauren has taken the lid off its growth potential.

raw.headline: Bull of the Day: Ralph Lauren (RL)
raw.summary: Attributed to its global expansion and digital transformation, Ralph Lauren has taken the lid off its growth potential.

headline: Bear of the Day: GIII Apparel Group (GIII)
summary: Investors may want to avoid GIII Apparel Group's (GIII) stock while the company goes through a tough transitional phase.

raw.headline: Bear of the Day: GIII Apparel Group (GIII)
raw.summary: Investors may want to avoid GIII Apparel Group's (GIII) stock while the company goes through a tough transitional phase.
